title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4223.6 - Race declared off
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4223.6 - Race declared off

State Regulations

If the racing secretary declares a race off, the names of
entrants in that race shall be posted on the official bulletin commission that
day, identifying the race by number as it appears in the condition
book. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4223.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
